name: Guess game by drawing
description:
Let’s see how well you know games! Can you name them all?
Core of my android game - guessing of popular and not popular games by drawings. There are 400 drawing of games like Mount and Blade, Stalker, Fallouts, GTA's, Divinity OS and many other games different genres.
Gameplay is simple:
1) Choose the level of difficulty
2) Start to guess the drawings!
After each completed level you open various scenes and funny moments from popular games on the game map!
FEATURES:
⭐ — 400🖐HAND🖐 drawings depicting popular games (as well as its situations and funny moments) you need to guess the name of.
⭐ — a great number of game genres: strategy, role-playing games, shooters, action games, platformers, even mobile games!
⭐ — Each picture can be guessed in different ways: you can type the game name yourself or guess it from four or six possible answers depending on the level of difficulty.
⭐ — Very small app weight (35 MB)
⭐ — 6 languages: Russian, English, Spanish, French, German and Italian!
This quizlet-puzzle game is suitable for both experienced computer and mobile games players, fans of different game genres - from strategy to RPG, RTS and shooters – and amateur players.
